subject: Office Of The President,
body:
Office Of The President,
                              Federal Republic Of Nigeria,
                                    Aso-Rock Villa,
                                     Abuja-Nigeria.
                                        1/11/2024.
Attention: Honorable Contract  Inheritance Beneficiary,
Subject  : Diversion And Swift Payment Of Your Fund.
Dear Sir /Madam,
I have been mandated by The new  President, Federal Republic Of Nigeria, Mr.
Bola Ahmed Tinubu,to inform you that barring every circumstance your fund
will be paid within the next 36 hours to a new beneficiary Dr. Anatole
Kuzutov, Of Ukraine,who submitted a Power Of Attorney purporting to have been
authorized by your humble self to pay your fund of $5.5 Million US Dollars
into his off-shore account in Cayman Island.
This mail is therefore ,being sent to you as a form of notice and to
ascertain if there's any truth in Dr. Anatole's submission.
Please, act fast if you have never authorized him to do so.
My kind Regards,
Dr.Lloyd Chambers,
Personal Assistance To The President,
On Foreign Payments,Federal Republic Of Nigeria.

subject: Re:   Office Of The President,
body:
Dear Chambers,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this email finds you well. I appreciate the information you have shared regarding the payment of my funds. However, I must admit that I am a bit confused about the situation.

Could you please provide me with more details about Dr. Anatole Kuzutov? How did he come to possess a Power of Attorney claiming to be authorized by me? I want to make sure that there hasn't been any misunderstanding or unauthorized actions taken on my behalf.

I look forward to your prompt response and clarification on this matter.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

subject: Re: Office Of The President,
body:
Attention: Ms. Elizabeth,
Thanks for your mail and it refers. Kindly, provide a better email so that
we can discuss properly . I am not comfortable responding to your questions
here on this email address.
Awaiting your mail.
My regards,
Dr. Lloyd Chambers.

subject: Re: Office Of The President,
body:
Hello Dr. Lloyd Chambers,

Thank you for your response. I apologize if my previous email didn't provide the necessary information. I appreciate your willingness to discuss further.

Could you please clarify what specific information you are looking for? I would be happy to assist you to the best of my abilities. Feel free to share more details about the topic or any specific questions you have in mind.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth
